title: Balaam’s First and Second Oracles
summary: Numbers 23 records Balaam’s first two attempts to curse Israel, but both times God puts blessings in his mouth instead. Balak is frustrated, but Balaam insists he can only speak what God allows.

faq.question: Did Balaam curse Israel?
faq.answer: No, he blessed them twice because God would not allow him to curse His people.

faq.question: What was Balaam’s response to Balak’s anger?
faq.answer: He reminded Balak that he could only speak the words God gave him.
